J As often happens in early youth, especially to one who leads a lonely life, he felt an unac- countable tenderness for this young man and made up his mind that they would be friends. 
Prince Vasili saw the princess off. She held a handkerchief to her eyes and her face was tear- ful. 
"It is dreadful, dreadful!" she was saying, "but cost me what it may I shall do my duty.
